title: The location of drains, sewers, STP, tanks, wells, trees, public facilities and services, electric lines, etc
clause_text: The location of drains, sewers, STP, tanks, wells, trees, public facilities and services, electric lines, etc.; A table indicating the size, area and use of all the plots in the sub-division/lay-out plan;
section: Contour plan of site, wherever necessary .
